name: The Seed (Freeze88)
description:
The Seed is a 2D platformer developed by first year students back in 2019 inspired by watching the movie Inception, mainly it's set design that shifts and rotates and the ability to be able to turn into someone else in the dream. Traverse the single level by manipulating gravity and shape-shifting into the enemy.

This game was developed by:

Afonso Rosa  - https://afonsogr.itch.io/
André Vitorino
Pedro Inácio - https://pmaiwow.itch.io/
